oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Synthesis of C-3-symmetric and C-4-symmetric amino acid derivatives via Suzuki-Miyaura cross-coupling reaction
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: KOTHA, S
SHAH, VR
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: molecular glass materials
diels-alder approach
optical-properties
phenylalanine derivatives
ethyl isocyanoacetate
ferrocene dendrimers
enyne metathesis
tic derivatives
tetraphenylmethane
peptides
c-3-symmetric amino acids
c-4-symmetric amino acid
carbon-carbon bond
non-natural alpha-amino acid derivatives
suzuki-miyaura cross-coupling reaction
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Various non-natural C-3- and C-4-symmetric alpha-amino acid derivatives have been synthesized via Suzuki-Miyaura cross-coupling reaction between aromatic iodides or bromide and a suitably protected DL-4-boronophenylalanine derivative.
